Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our cooling infrastructure. Start time : 07/01/2026 07:00 UTC End time : 07/01/2026 17:00 UTC Service impact : During this maintenance, the cooling system's efficiency may be temporarily reduced for some servers, potentially lowering performance. Despite ongoing mitigation efforts, customers could still experience a temporary reboot or shutdown in the worst case.
